The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 03 September is 293,925 (522.2 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 30 August, there were 7,848 new confirmed cases (13.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 23 August, there were 6,742 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 16% (1106 extra cases).
